Articles.Content:
Last video I mentioned capturing KSP 1.6 animations for good reasons.

Then I got snowed in last weekend and those good intentions turned into badS boogaloo.


Music:

"Enter the Party"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Excellent, keeps getting better the further you get into it.

Kerbal idle anims, good for screenshots and now music videos.
